name: Echoes of The Underworld
description:
Go deep into the underworld to save the soul of your loved one! But beware, you are not alone.

Made in 72h for Ludum Dare 48

Rate our Game! Follow us!

Lucas Felix (Programming)

João Vitor Costa Dias (Music)

Matheus Homsi (Sound Design)

Mauricio Wolff (Game Design and Programming)
